title: Three.js workshop
description: On 22 November, we conducted an exciting workshop where Overflowers brought our solar system to life on their laptops by creating 3D objects of solar bodies such as planets, moon and stars using a JavaScript library called Three.JS.

title: Bytehackz 2024
description: Overflow facilitated a hackathon called Bytehackz for Year 2 students of Diploma in Information Technology on 12 and 13 November. During this hackathon, there were fun booths for nerf gun, board games, nintendo console games, as well as a variety of snacks!

title: Unity Part II
description: On 8 November, Overflowers learned how to recreate some of the features essential in making the gaming experience fun and enjoyable using Unity.

title: Unity Part I
description: On 1 November, Overflowers learned the fundamentals of game development and brought game characters and worlds to life using the game engine called Unity.
